channel.title: Welcome
channel.description:
This section has been created for those at the higher end of the RSC development community.
This section has several purposes:
[ul][li]To encourage significant development in a friendly environment by removing undesirable members.[/li] [li]To increase your confidence in this website's support for RSC development, which will, hopefully, encourage you to undertake joint projects with others that have access to this section, as well as sharing portions of your own personal RSC developments.[/li] [li]To allow discussion that is RSC-oriented.[/li][/ul]
I only have three expectations of everyone that has been granted access to this section:
[ul][li]You do not make the existence of this section common knowledge to the public. Referring to it on IRC or something isn't a big deal, but constantly alluding to the fact that such a section exists is highly undesirable.[/li] [li]You do not release anybody's work. This has been a problem in the past - Person A is given something by Person B, and Person B decides to pass it on to Person C, and then Person C releases it to the public in return for reputation points.[/li] [li]You do not distribute any discussion that takes place here to any third parties, by any means. Anything posted in here stays in here.[/li][/ul]
Anyone found undermining the values and expectations of this section will have their access to this section removed immediately; they will also receive a temporary ban. I doubt this will be an issue though, as, unlike the public sections, people can't just create a new account to regain access, which means that you should value your account because of its ability to access this section.
People with access to this section:
[ul][li]Anarchist`[/li] [li]KO9[/li] [li]Peter[/li] [li]Stork[/li] [li]Vrunk[/li] [li]xEnt[/li] [li]object (aka Protosstribe)[/li][/ul]

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco

you sold it to zoby? didn’t know that

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:21, topic:258003”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=340624.msg3810676#msg3810676 date=1320878910]
So this section has been here for years and I haven’t got access to it, and I’ve been here for many years
[/quote]Really? I thought you came here within the last year…[/quote]
I’ve been here since the franks wL server was only server released. If you were around back then, u might remember me as ‘nemesis’, although that account seems to be disappeared from db. I’ve had few servers, Edge-PKz was my very first which was based on demonik v2 and also demon-classic which used demonik v7, which I then sold to zoby(not sure about name anymore) for like 300$.

Read full topic

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This section has been converted to also serve the development needs of the MoparScape Classic server (since nothing ever happened in it before), no one lost access, a few gained it, the current member list consists of:

CodeForFame
KO9
Kryptix
meatstick
Miss Silabsoft
Newty
object
Old Rsc Player
Peeter
Stork
vortex
Vrunk
xEnt
Zilent

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: @Vrunk Vrunk
item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

I’ve seen this happen in other forums before. As long as everyone in this section works together to support one another (instead of arguing about who knows the most about X), then this could be successful. All I’m saying is don’t let this turn into a section to showcase your individual talents. Use your talents to help get some work done.

Read full topic

item.description:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy

@lothy wrote:

List is done. As you can see it’s quite exclusive at the moment. Any suggested user backed by at least a few of you will be given access as well.

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:7, topic:258003”][quote author=Peter link=topic=340624.msg2638667#msg2638667 date=1232708053]
Heh, we need to get punkRocker here also.
[/quote]
Well you guys run the show with regards to granting access. My only request is that you don’t nominate someone for access if you know they’re evading a ban. T X would be a good example.

Is punkRocker’s username just “Punkrocker”, or is it slightly different?[/quote]

No-one likes T x so I don’t think theres an issue there :). A list of everyone who has access would work

Read full topic
